description:
We'd like to understand the causes of stress and offer up more of our best stress-busting tips and tricks, offering you a session of adifferent guided relaxation, different new herbal teas and comfort healthy food, aromatic oils, secrets and knowledge.

Is a break to start taking care of ourselves!
name: Let's stress less!

description:
Come to discover and live a session to change the perceptions you have on relaxation and deep inner balance. Perceive yourself in a different way, go back to who you really are.
We’d like you to experience our new session mixing different moments, to stop the race we all are living every day.
Experience the impact of music on your physical, emotional, mental, social state to help your health.
Experience the silence: some of the most powerful moments of a"talking relaxation" include no talking.
Perceive the Moment : perception is action, perception is not something done with the eyes or the ears or any specific sense organ. It is a multi-sensory, full bodied experience.
Philosophy and Perception of the Food: food is about life as well as luxury. It is about serious things like hunger and malnutrition, diabetes and heart disease, eating and being eaten. It is a profoundly moral issue.Mindset can affect feelings of physical satiety :the brain can be tricked into either feeling full or feeling unsatisfied. That feeling depends on what people believed they are consuming rather than what they actually are consuming.
Experience the delicate foot massage, a little bit different from other massages The difference is that foot massage stimulates not only the muscles, which are directly rubbed, but also gives a positive effect on the whole body because of the huge set of reflex points, which are responsible for the state of the body as a whole.
name: A new deep inner balance through a new way of caring

description: 1 hour dedicated to 3 people: a 20 minutes massage for each of you with Michela while I'll be advising the rest of the group on healthy but flavory way of eating and check your style of nutrition! Herbal rare teas will be offered!
name: Food advices + rare herbal teas + Healthy Massage

description:
Eat and drink your way to relaxation!

Come to discover and live a practical session to change the perceptions you have on nutrition, through relaxation.

Food is about life as well as a luxury.

Mindset can affect feelings of physical satiety :the brain can be tricked into either feeling full or feeling unsatisfied. That feeling depends on what people believed they are consuming rather than what they actually are consuming.
name: Nutrition and relaxation

description:
Come to learn how to digest aliments easily, perform special exercises to learn tips and tricks, exerce your mouth and mind to guide you through no bloating, no stress and easy digestion!

Session will take place for minimum number of 6 people to maximum number of 10
name: Nutrition and relaxation

description:
Come to learn how to digest aliments easily, perform special exercises to learn tips and tricks, exerce your mouth and mind to guide you through no bloating, no stress and easy digestion!

Session will take place for minimum number of 6 people to maximum number of 10
name: Nutrition and relaxation

description:
This is the 3rd of a 6 class to educate you, empower you and inspire you through food, in line with my activity as a Jamie Oliver Volunteer for the global Food Revolution!

We have learned about the first food, breathing and water, the chewing importance and the first Paleo diet.. now we will learn why and how to introduce grains and fiber on this healthy raw fruits and vegs attitude;

Recipes on the go: 

RAW APPETIZERS AND DRINKS

POLPETTONE DI AVOCADO 

PALEO ICE CREAM WITH RED, WHITE FRUITS AND OAT CREAM
name: Revolutionize your way of eating,  one step a day

description:
Korean Relaxation is a very old technique that is currently practiced in some Korean families as well as Korean monasteries and some French monasteries to regulate physical and emotional tensions.
We will practice in group, is extremely relaxing and producing very many well being effects.
name: Korean relaxation

description:
Healthy, nutritious food and breathing exercises are the simplest methods for relieving stress. These methods are not only cost effective but readily available – and without any side effects. Foods with high vitamin and mineral levels actively help to reduces stress levels.
Our best stress-busting tips and tricks and a light guided relaxation, different new herbal teas and perfumed waters, aromatic oils, secrets and knowledge.
name: How food can affect your stress level?

description:
This presentation will take place during Saveurs Toscanes, in the mark of my activity as a Volunteer for the Jamie Oliver's Food Revolution Foundation. The presentation will take place on Saturday the 4 and Sunday the 5th of October at l'Arsenal (find below the address).

The presentation will be held in French

Entrance fee, if you register with me, will be 10 euro instead of 12.

The event has a various programs, all the day long,  with cookery demonstration, small Tuscany producer involved, organic food. 

Updating on the program of the Event Saveurs Toscanes, very soon!
name: Presentation on Nutrition: retrouver son Nord avec l'alimentation Italienne

description:
MINIMUM NUMBER: 7 PEOPLE

Naturopathic Nutrition stresses the use of whole and organic foods as medicine - an integral concept of healing in many indigenous societies. Today, we see that a return to chemical-free foods, along with other dietary measures, is an effective answer to many health complaints and common conditions.
I'll bring to you authentic traditions of Oriental medicine with current, Western research-based nutrition tips.
The tasting, will guide you through the world of grains, fibre, fruits, as well as herbs, teas and infusions; 2 vegetable recipes will introduce you to the world of greens.
name: Cooking for Health: Naturopathic Nutrition with tasting!
